resources.string: Ensure the device has good internet connection and adequate network data bundle for uploads.
Scroll to SecuredCameraShots on the permission screen and allow \' Appear On Top \' permission for the app to function properly.
Choose Google account whose Google Drive will be used to store uploaded media files. Captured files will be automatically upload to the account\'s Google drive.
Create a long video or shorts and upload on youtube. Interact with your subscribers on youtube live.
Choose desired option for uploading media file to Google Drive.
Choose same email address as logged in user to view the captured files stored in Google Drive.\n Incase of issue accessing the files,logout and login again.".
